description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

话题：

Creative Writing: imagine a scenario
Morning comes, and a new day has begun. What will happen today? How are the people feeling? Will it be a normal day with routine activities, or will it be a day full of surprises?

This week's topic: A new day has begun... (90-110 words)

范例1：

The lecture would be in a few days, but Sean already drafted out his presentation. He could afford to relax this weekend. As he laid in bed this nice morning, an idea popped into his head. Other than just talk about neuroscience and look at brain scans, he could also show the students the laboratory by filming a short clip of a tour of the facility. Sean had a cell phone with a decent camera, but he remembered that his housemate had a much better camera. Not only for this lecture, but the video might come in handy when he needed to lobby for more funding.

title: 英文天天写：Invitation(XXIII)

description:
Meanwhile, back now in West London, angst amongst the arty middle classes in the latest film from a high priestess of affluent unease Joanna Hogg. Seven years ago, her debut "Unrelated" a keenly observed account of an Italian villa holiday, won prizes for its good looks and disturbing mood. That was followed by "Archipelago", another awkward family holiday, this time on the Scilly Isle of Tresco. But Joanna Hogg's third film "Exhibition" stays firmly at home, in the elegant modernist home of two artists D and H. They have lived and worked in this concrete and glass fortress with a smart West London postcode for 18 years. Now they're contemplating selling, but when the agents call for instructions, D is reluctant to face the prospect of strangers moving in.

In a way, I can't even go there to start thinking what they might do with the house. You know, I'm gonna have to cut off emotionally and separate, otherwise, you know, it seems to be too hurtful, but, I don't ever want it to be pulled down. You know, it's important. It isn't...

You don't have to be here when people are being shown around if you don't want to. I mean we can arrange where it is useful for you.

And we're trying, make it as painless as it possibly can.

title: 乔安娜•霍格的中产阶级情节（有声）

description:
Well let's move to football now where Real Madrid have booked their place in this year's Champions League final. They trashed the titleholders Bayern Munich 4-0 on Tuesday in Germany, 5-0 on aggregate. The BBC's Conor McNamara was in Munich.

It's been a long time since Bayern Munich were last humiliated like this in front of their own supporters. The reigning champions and early season favourites to retain their crown were just demolished by Real Madrid's perfectly executed counterattacking. Centre-half Sergio Ramos scored the first two, almost carbon copy headers from set pieces. Gareth Bale did very well to create the third goal of the night for Cristiano Ronaldo and the Portuguese completed the rout for the clever free-kick at the end. Real Madrid will face either Chelsea or their city rivals Atlético Madrid in the final.

Well those two goals from Cristiano Ronaldo brought his Champions League goal tally to 16 this season, a new record in the competition, and it was a first victory for Real at the 10th time of asking when playing Bayern in Munich. So it's a first final appearance in 12 years for Carlo Ancelotti's side, and later on Wednesday, he'll know who they'll face in Lisbon at the end of May as Chelsea and Atlético Madrid meet in London for their second leg semi-final tie. The Chelsea boss José Mourinho has confirmed that John Terry will start after a recent ankle injury and had special praise for his captain.

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

歌手介绍:

伊迪娜·门泽尔（ Idina Menzel）， 1971年5月30日出生于美国纽约。伊迪娜·门泽尔凭借百老汇经典舞台剧《女巫前传》中饰演阿尔法巴一角，获得托尼奖最佳女演员奖。1995年出演《吉屋出租》开始百老汇生涯。
2013年11月27日上映的迪士尼动画电影《冰雪奇缘》中伊迪娜·门泽尔为拥有冰雪魔法的长公主艾莎配音并演唱。电影主题曲《Let It Go》

模唱片段：

Cause I stand for the power to change
I live for the perfect day
I love 'till it hurts like crazy
I hope for a hero to save me
I stand for the strange and lonely
I believe there's a better place
I don't know, if the sky is heaven, but I pray anyway

description:
图为艾伦·亨宁

《英闻天天译》是一档沪江部落的原创翻译互动节目（戳去参与节目>>>），主持人提供翻译参考文本，对大家递交的翻译作品进行点评，和大家共同进步！本期节目选取的是关于let him go的一则英文报道，让我们一起在翻译中关注。

SUMMARY：
ISIS最新预告他们将斩首英国人质Alan Henning，Alan是英国的一名出租车司机，因为同情叙利亚人，加入伊斯兰慈善组织，曾放弃假期驱车6400英里为叙利亚难民送去援助物资。
 
CONTENT：
The wife of British hostage Alan Henning pleaded Saturday with the Islamic State terror group to release her husband, describing him as a "peaceful, selfless man" who was only in Syria to help people in need.
"I cannot see how it could assist any State's cause to allow the world to see a man like Alan dying," according to a message from Barbara Henning released by the UK Foreign Office.
"I have been trying to communicate with the Islamic State and the people holding Alan. I have sent some really important messages but they have not been responded to."
 
KEYWORDS:  
Hostage 人质
Alan Henning 艾伦.亨宁
Plead---with向···恳求
IslamicState 伊斯兰国家 （（又称穆斯林国家）指以伊斯兰教为国教和多数居民信奉伊斯兰教的国家和地区共计57个国家和2个地区（西撒哈拉和科索沃））
Syria 叙利亚 （叙利亚位于亚洲西部，地中海东岸，北与土耳其接壤，东同伊拉克交界，南与约旦毗连，西南与黎巴嫩和巴勒斯坦为邻，西与塞浦路斯隔地中海相望。）
terrorgroup 恐怖组织
UKForeign Office 英国外交部
BarbaraHenning 芭芭拉.亨宁
Release 发布
 
Key sentence
I cannot see how it could assist any State's cause to allow the world to see aman like Alan dying.
这句画中，主干就是 I cannot see the content。我看不见··· 谓语动词后跟how引导的宾语从句，在从句中it 做形式主语，指代的是后文中的toallow the world to see a man like Alan dying，所以正常的语序是，to allow theworld to see a man like Alan dying could assist any State's cause.结构就很清楚了。作者在这里是对各界不顾艾伦死活的态度表述愤慨以及无奈之情。注意合理组织语序。
 
REFERENCE：

http://edition.cnn.com/2014/09/20/world/europe/isis-alan-henning-plea/index.html?hpt=hp_t1

【沪江英语小编】大家在查看主持人提供的翻译版本前，可以先自己进行尝试翻译练习，只有在不断的翻译中翻译能力才能有所提升哦！

轻松注册沪江，马上参与【英闻天天译】节目练翻译→

本期节目参考译文：（参考译文由该节目主持人提供，仅供参考，欢迎大家讨论）

参考译文1：

周六，英国人质艾伦.亨宁的妻子恳请伊斯兰国家恐怖组织释放其夫。“他爱好和平，无私奉献，只身前往叙利亚仅为向所需帮助之人予以援手，”她是这么形容艾伦的。
芭芭拉.亨宁经由英国外交部发布一则讯息，她表示，“我并未发现，世界听任如艾伦一般的人死去会对任何国家的大业有甚裨益。”
“我曾试图同伊斯兰国家以及持有艾伦的人员进行交涉，并向他们传达了一些相当重要的讯息，不过至今仍未有人做出回应。”

description:
本节目为沪江部落一档美语发音模仿节目，每期节目选取30秒左右的慢速VOA新闻内容，主持人亲自朗读示范模仿发音，对发音要点进行讲解，并配以详细的语音语调示意图，手把手教你练就地道美音范儿！想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：winshare2012

30秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：The Internet company Google is testing its newest high-tech device, Google Glass. Most of the technologies for Google Glass are already available on smart phones. Google has taken those same technologies and added them to eyeglass frames. The company describes the glasses as wearable computers that would change the way people view others and the world.

译文：谷歌公司正在测试它的最新高科技产品——谷歌眼镜。谷歌眼镜所使用的大部分技术目前都已经在智能手机上使用。谷歌公司将这些技术加入到了谷歌眼镜的框架中。谷歌公司将这个眼镜描述成可以佩戴的电脑，这个眼镜将改变人们观察他人和世界的方式。

重点单词发音讲解：

连读及语调讲解：

google \ˈgü-gəl\ \gᴜgl\ 注意 oo 字母的发音，不要读成“谷狗”。
technology \tek-ˈnä-lə-jē\ \tɛk'nɑlədʒi\ 注意第一个o字母的发音，开口较大。
